snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey remains in hot water after his office was linked to lane closings causing gridlock in Fort Lee, N.J., as political punishment for the town’s mayor who did not endorse the governor. Sunday morning show guests dole...
abstract: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey remains in hot water after his office was linked to lane closings causing gridlock in Fort Lee, N.J., as political punishment for the town’s mayor who did not endorse the governor. Sunday morning show guests dole out advice for the possible 2016 presidential candidate.
